attributes.additional_details:
The Chernobyl Arch is a necessity for humanity.

We, as a country, contributed a mere £50 million to a several billion expense project.

The funding has slowed and costs have spiraled. It is my proposal that we, as a human race, have a responsibility to correct and contain our error and as the UK was directly affected, we should be more directly involved in the clean up.

Sources;

http://www.neimagazine.com/news/newswork-on-chernobyl-cover-continues-despite-funding-concerns-4204932
